Well, I think I'd like the work to speak for itself.
And I guess I... I just wanted to know that you'd be spoken for before I leave this place.
Hey, I'm sorry people talk to you like that and I can't do anything to stop them. Aww.
No--don't speak of him like that.
Well, I'm right here, but you always tell me not to talk to you, so I didn't know if I should say anything.
It means just because he's talking to the man in the sky doesn't make him good enough to be your friend.
I'm not leaving this place until I talk to the guy who makes...
I talked to the guys over at 3M.
No. But we have to figure out a way to make her.

And maybe having him talk to the police isn't the greatest idea right now.
So she's, like, alright, well, sure, why not, you know.
